subject: Simsonn plus x clutch pedal
description_text:
Hello simsonn,
I was wondering if I could buy the plus x series pedal that is the clutch
only. I don't own a shifter yet but I already own the brake and throttle
pedals. Let me know of this is possible.
Thanks,
Trent Richard

conversations.body_text: Hi，Brent Richards，  请问您是在哪个平台购买的？我看看有没有单独连接离合器踏板的选项。

I have not bought the pedals yet.

On Tue, Jun 10, 2025, 9:05 PM service@simsonn.com

These are the pedals that I plan to buy:
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0D3TXMNK5/?coliid=I3GAA1D8PNW8DV&colid=220YKF2O439QK&psc=1&ref_=list_c_wl_lv_ov_lig_dp_it
, the *simpson plus X P2-H2*. I would like to, later on, purchase the
clutch pedal that goes with this set as well as your simpson PC usb 7+R H
gear shifter. Let me know if you are able to sell these to me separately.
Thanks,
Brent

wrote:

Hi Brent Richards,  You can just buy P3-H3 which is more cost effective than buying P2-H2 + clutch .

I want just the clutch.

On Fri, Jun 13, 2025, 4:32 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Brent Richards,  YES, we also sell the clutch pedal separately, but our US warehouse does not have it. If you purchase it, we can ship it to you from our China warehouse.
